Data:
From: [SENDER]
To: [RECEIVER]
Subject: MAS Provisioning Notification (contains credentials)
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-type: Multipart/Mixed; boundary="NextPart"

--NextPart
Content-Type: text/plain

[MESSAGE-TEXT]

MAS provisioning status: [STATUS]
Region: [REGION]
Unique String: [UNIQ-STR]
OpenShift Password: [OCP-PASSWORD]
MAS Password: [MAS-PASSWORD]
